name: Sente
description:
Sente is an abstract strategy board game

with electricity, shields, lasers, and explosions, for 2 to 6 players that move simultaneously, where each move can cause a cascade of consequences while the board seeks to regain balance.


Sente has a very deep strategy, so you must anticipate the complete consequences of each of your moves.

Unlike Chess or Go, in Sente, all players’ moves happen simultaneously on the board.

Players build electrical networks and try to defeat adversaries by destroying their power lines to turn them off, or make them explode!

Boards vary in size and shape, matches can start with different setups, so every combination changes the way you have to think.

Who wins in Sente?

The one who predicts or guesses better the simultaneous movement of the adversary based on information that is not hidden

Sente is fun to play, and fun to watch!

Sente will be current for the next ten thousand years, and that’s no game.

Features

  • Matches For 2 to 6 Players
  • Challenge your friends or find opponents online!
  • Play locally with your friends or versus an AI, up to 6 players on the same device!
  • Play Free4All or Teams!
  • Procedural boards, each match is a unique experience!
  • Play custom matches, on small or large boards, filled with tokes, or stones, or change anything you want! Every combination creates a different gameplay experience
  • Build your own board templates with the Board Editor, try new things and play with your friends!
  • Rewatch your played matches, with playback controls!
  • Check your stats against your friends and watch your matches together.

Features in development

  • Customize your tokens with Skins!
  • Stats & Leaderboards
  • Achievements
  • Check your stats against your friends and watch your matches together.
